40+ Years of Experience 300+ Founders Served Over $100M raised

Pitching To Investors

We help founders raise $1M+ using story-rich pitch decks & impeccable financial models

Book a Call

Why Us

We let our work speak for itself but here are more reasons why you should work with us.

Start Your Project
Team of Experts
Our team comprises over eight experienced business writers, financial analysts, and designers with prior working experience in Big-4 accounting firms. This means you can trust that your pitch deck and projections will be of the highest quality and professional standards.
Proven Track Record
We have a track record of success, having written over 400 plans, accumulated 40+ years of experience, and worked with over 30+ industries. This experience gives us a deep understanding of the needs of a wide variety of businesses
Result-based Consulting
Our clients have seen real results, with over $100M raised from pre-seed to series A funding. Our pitch decks and projections have a proven track record of helping companies secure the funding they need to grow and succeed.
Personalized Support
At Stellar Consultancy, we provide personalized support and consultation with fast turnarounds without compromising on quality. We understand the importance of a timely funding raise, and we work with you to create a pitch deck and projections that will help you achieve your goals.
Investor-ready Business Plans
We help companies create comprehensive and compelling business plans that are tailored to the needs of venture capitalists, banks, and angel investors. These plans are designed to persuade investors to fund your business.

+0

Clients we have worked with

Hear from our clients

Working with Jamal has been great. I'm very pleased with the result. He easily understood what our project was about. I highly recommend Jamal and will definitely work with him again. He is very professional and easy to communicate with. Thank you, Jamal. It's been a pleasure working with you.

Jade Tao
CEO - Clanity

Jamal has been thoroughly professional throughout. We have been quite demanding and going back and forth on our requirements, but he has patiently explained his method and reasoning and we are left with a model we're happy with and can flexibly mold as our business needs evolve over time. Thanks Jamal!

Joey Hext
Co-Founder - BuddyUp

Jamal is the man!!! He's no-nonsense, to the point and my kind of guy. Oh and by the way, he's the best at what he does. He took my choppy direction and created a masterpiece, thank you so much! I will definitely be using his services again.

Brendon Robinson
CEO BR BoardRoom

Jamal was very professional and the delivery of work exceeded my expectation. He knows what he is doing and helps me through the process to deliver the final product. I highly recommend Jamal to anyone to develop a financial model and all work related to Business, Finance, and Accounting.

Dr. Sajjad Syed
CEO Sol Carry

An excellent team to work with. Very knowledgeable in all areas ranging from Market Research , Business Plan to Pitch Deck. will certainly recommend to any startup looking for such a service. Great job Jamal & Team !!

Ali Asghar
CEO RightCliQ

Jamal and his team offer deep and proficient business expertise which we have found to be priceless. In every respect, we are impressed with the amount of effort put into understand our business model and to get inside our target investors mindset. We could not be more happy with his stellar performance on this project. For us this is not going to be just a "gig", rather a strategic relationship that we will value going forward. Thank you again for the incredible job you've done on this.

Winston Graf
CEO of Winston Graf

I am going to repeat myself, so just book immediately Jamal for your financial model or financial plan, you will be so impressed by the job quality. I have placed several orders and I am always so impressed. Thank you, Jamal!

Jean Jacques
CEO Wakanda Messenger

Awesome! I will be hiring Jamal again for future projects! He's the TRUTH for drafting financial projections for large corporate companies, i.e. Biotech/BioPharma Thank You So Much Jamal!

Tia Lyles
Founder, LucasPye BIO

I have the utmost respect for Jamal both as a human being and as a professional. He work ethic and the quality of his ouputs are truly industry leading. Having tried many other providers before having had the privilege of meeting Jamal I can inform you that he is a rare find and that I would be more then happy to act as a reference.

Andrew Firmenich
CEO - Quantifying Nature

"Thanks to your planning, our business is funded to the tune of $50M. I highly recommend Jamal to anyone who is looking for a serious business strategist and analyst with a deep understanding of financial modeling"

Jess Davis
CEO, Uberstate

Our Services

Investor Ready Business Plans
An investor-ready business plan is perfect for any startup or businesses for approaching their investors including venture capitalists, banks or angel investors and convince them for their funding in the business.
Learn More
Financial Modeling
We create detailed financial models that provide realistic projections of your business's financial performance, helping you make informed decisions about your company's future.
Learn More
Investor-ready Pitch Decks
We help companies create visually appealing and engaging pitch decks that communicate the key aspects of their business and convince investors to fund their venture.
Learn More
Investor Outreach
Our team will assist your company in identifying the ideal investors based on demographics, needs, size, company stage etc., using cold email outreach and LinkedIn organic connections to reach out to the potential investors."
Learn More

Meet The Team

We Bring Over 40 Years of Team experience.

Jamal Ahmed Khan
ACA – Founder, Partner

Jamal is a Chartered Accountant by qualification and a Go-To-Expert for Investor Documents, Pitch decks & Business Plans. Jamal is a Board Member of 3 startups accumulatively worth $30 Million in Valuation and has served clients from over 20 countries.
